sentences.sContent: According to traditions, the selectmen are required by law to perambulate the bounds every five years.
sentences.sContent_eng: According to traditions, the selectmen are required by law to perambulate the bounds every five years.
sentences.sCn: 根据传统法律要求市镇行政管理委员会成员每隔五年巡视边界一次。

remMethod.val: per(贯穿) ＋ ambul(行走) ＋ ate → 到处走 → 巡视

trans.tranOther: When someone perambulates, they walk around for pleasure
